text: RuPaul's Drag Race star Detox estimates he has'gallons'of silicone in his body, but he firmly regrets having cosmetic surgery on his abs after he was left with a wonky, uneven six pack. The reality star, whose real name is Matthew Sanderson, is begging Botched surgeons Dr. Paul Nassif and Dr. Terry Dubrow to fix his abs because he constantly has to wear a corset or girdle to'smooth everything out'on his stomach. In a preview clip for Wednesday night's episode of the E! reality series, Matthew, 33, explains that he fell in love with drag after seeing his first show as a teenager and his newfound passion led to him getting extensive cosmetic surgery.
